attributes.action: Debate to prevent the integration by stealth of British Military into the EU
attributes.background: Michael Fallon appears to have made a slip when he inadvertently stated this is just the beginning of armed forces integration with the EU. Unfortunately he has no mandate from the people to do it but neither does he have the mandate to even talk about it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for a clear specific action from the UK Government and Parliament.
